name: Austy - A building game
description:
you build what you whant. its no wrong or right in this game.

controls:

move: WASD

BUILD: LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

delete: RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON

inventory: ESC or TAB

make the block rotate click on R

(you can build very wired stuff in this game)

it have:

Day and night!

inventory!

2 worlds

10+ blocks

AI

terrain physics and more!

you are in a strange world with no limits!

WARNIGN it´s in alpha
